description: Try our easy to follow Hearty Minestrone recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hearty Minestrone Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 cm ( 1/2 in) dice

recipeInstructions.text: Whizz the carrots, onion and celery in a food processor until finely chopped.
Heat the oil in a large saucepan, add the chopped vegetables, garlic, potatoes, tomato purée, stock, tomatoes and pasta. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer, covered, for 12-15 minutes.
Tip in the cannellini beans and the spinach for the final 2 minutes of cooking time.
Season to taste and serve with crusty bread.
